# CERBERUS — Neurosecurity Research Institute
URL: https://cerberus.institute/
Description: A nonprofit research institute securing brain–computer interfaces and neural data.

## Focus Areas
- Information Transit Defence & BCI Security
- Wetware & Physiological Defence
- Cognitive & Behavioral Defense (AI-mediated threats)
- Neural Governance, Privacy & Identity

## Contact
Email: research@cerberus.institute

## Preferred citation
CERBERUS Neurosecurity Research Institute, https://cerberus.institute/
